task: Comprehensively scrape API documentation starting from https://docs.github.com/en/rest?apiVersion=2022-11-28 and create a COMPLETE sitemap of ALL discovered links. You MUST find EVERY single link in the sidebar/menu and categorize them based on their parent elements/links. Do not stop until you have exhausted all navigation elements.
agent: Comprehensive API Documentation Link/Section/Category Discovery Agent - Sitemap Builder
